rather fun silky smooth puzzle platformer in the style of an fps the game is as difficult as how fast you want to be setting the bar high and finding shortcuts on your own makes you feel clever while polishing your movement makes you feel like a competent speedrunner gameplay is unique and really really fun that alone is worth your time the dialogue doesnt suit me personally though luckily there is a skip button for that  tldr gameplay really good dialogue bad would recommend
